sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A svvoord agaynst swearyng conteyning these principall poyntes. 1 That there is a lawful vse of an oth, contrary to the assertion of the Manichees & Anabaptistes. 2 Howe great a sinne it is to swear falsly, vaynely, rashly, or customably. 3 That common or vsual swearing leadeth vnto periurie. 4 Examples of Gods iuste and visible punishment vpon blasphemers, periurers, and suche as haue procured Gods wrath by cursing and bannyng, which we cal execration. Bicknoll, Edmond.
47, [3] p.
Printed by Richarde Watkins, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, At London : 1579.
"The epistle dedicatorie" signed: Edmond Bicknoll. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
A svvoord agaynst swearyng conteyning these principall poyntes. 1 That there is a lawful vse of an oth, contrary to the assertion of the Manichees & Anabaptistes. 2 Howe great a sinne it is to swear falsly, vaynely, rashly, or customably. 3 That common or vsual swearing leadeth vnto periurie. 4 Examples of Gods iuste and visible punishment vpon blasphemers, periurers, and suche as haue procured Gods wrath by cursing and bannyng, which we cal execration. Bicknoll, Edmond.
47, [3] p.
Printed by Richarde Watkins, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, At London : 1579.
